name: Snip.ly
short_description:
Snip.ly offers a group of tools to allow you to easily share small snippets of
content from your favorite articles online
long_description:
Sniply is an online platform and software that enables its users to share
content and generate traffic. It enables its users to attach a link to content
shared by them. It enables its users to generate more signups and subscribers
for their websites. Sniply was founded in 2010 by Abhijit Rao, Abhishek Amit,
and Zal Bilimoria. It is based in San Francisco, California.
